name: Dreaming (itch) (danikiedis)
description:
2D game developed in Godot engine for the GameMakersToolKit 2020 48h gamejam.

Theme: Out of Control

When falling asleep, our worst fears and anxieties may be summoned in the form of a bad dream, where we have to face uncontrollable traps and dangers. Help Blue make it through this night!

Team:

Cedrik Rocha - Game Designer
Cristina Sena - Background Artist
Daniela Reigas - Producer, Writer
Licínio Souza - 2D Game Artist
nan0.core - 3D Artist
Rica - Programmer
Rodrigo Passos - Sound Designer
Sysware - Programming assistant
Taneko / Araketu - Voice Actor
Tui - Programmer
